reviews.review_msg: Don't take him. Save your GPA.

Very passionate intense young man - shows in lectures. Has extremely high expectations (esp. for written work)! But he's a REALLY NICE guy, kind, & approachable! Addresses any questions you may have & will help you with the material. WORK HARD & you'll survive. Ah, DEATH march, hike & run -oh pain. Funny guy. Loves piwo. Great trip! SUPER EXTRA!!!

HE WAS SO EFFING HOT, like honestly i went to class to just look at him. I got an A- and i swear it was because when he talked and when he laughed it did something to my heart. He is a Polish beauty. Goooo Tomasz Majek! WE LOVE YOU <3

He is very knowledgeable in the subject he teaches. Attending class is not mandatory because lectures are voice recorded but try to watch the video he shows in class because it might come up in the test. Assignment wise, I would say it's pretty straight forward. My only complaint is that different TAs have different marking style for the papers.
I don't want this to become an angry rant, so I will just warn everyone, taking his class will be a very serious waste of GPA

Don't take his course, unless you are very confident with your average. His assignments are really hard and some questions are not related to the lecture. He wants exact definitions from the book, which means you need to memorize a hundred definitions. So, make your choice.
i found that if you do your readings and attend lectures its not hard at all to get a decent mark. on the plus side hes funny and not bad to look at at all

I just want to warn anyone who wants to take a class with him. Don't. Essay questions are completely unrelated to the answers he wants you to somehow magically produce, and topics covered in depth in class are not included on exams. I would highly recommend that unless you want to get 4/15 on a 100 level essay, you wait for another prof.

class topics are interesting. he gives quite a bit of examples. but the exams are relly tough- all written. he wants exact definations. and long answer questions are really hard. no one gets full marks. same with essays. marks hard. but hes cute

He's an awesome lecturer, but the exams were BRUTAL. The final was multiple choice, and the questions were so confusing it was silly. Also, the guidelines for the paper weren't so clear and NO ONE got an 'A'. Actually, no one got an 'A' in the whole course. . . . He's good looking, but he's not so cute after the mid-term, let me tell you. . . .

Really interesting class. Really nice, helpful, interesting prof. Labs are easy. Midterm and final were easy if you read the text and watched the videos. I liked it better when he didn't have power point because he drew out diagrams on the blackboard and was more interactactive. Good at explaining and keeping the examples relevant and interesting.

Had him for economic and service activities.  Hard tests, hard marker, expects a lot.  Lot of the assigned readings were in my opinion above 2nd/3rd yr undergrad level. Not a horrible prof, but his expectations are high.  If you want a good mark you have to devote an above average amount of time to his courses, which not everyone can afford to do.
The final was intense, but if you attend all the classes, Tomasz lectures are very good. Cute and a great instructor!
I liked him!  He was very well informed and kept things interesting.  I would take another class with him.

Horrible prof ... completely unhelpful and midterm and final weren't even well related to topics covered in class. Also, tutorials were a total waste of time as they didn't even relate to what was covered in lecture. AVIOD TAKING HIM FOR ANY COURSE!

after the midterm exam he totally slacked off in regards to lecture...he never had powerpt notes nor were the lectures interesting nemore and it showed in the final exam...most of the MC questions were useless info from the text that we didnt even go over...thanks for wasting my  2nd half of the semester !!!

final exam was a total waste of time...most of the multiple choice  qs were stupid facts from the text (he didnt even go over info in the text pretty much) totally useless when questioned his marking on midterm (didnt want to be bothered to change marks) TA was kinda weird too
Handsome TA!! although he always askes Questions in Tut, he leads me think a lot!!!
